title: The 50p Brexit coins aren't the only things in meltdown... I've finally lost the plot
text:
Until this week, I thought I was following Brexit. I really did. I’ve become a connoisseur of EU stratagems and Katya Adler’s scarf collection. I’ve got my head round the Meaningful Votes (invariably meaningless). Now, I fear, I’ve lost the plot.

As we don’t seem to be leaving tomorrow, the 50p Brexit commemorative coins are being melted down. They’re not the only ones in meltdown. Take my brain, for example. And the House of Commons. MPs seem to have finally “jumped the shark”, the term they use for sitcoms which have veered from the realms of the vaguely plausible into utter lunacy.

Telegraph subscribers are fortunate to receive the daily Brexit Bulletin by the marvellous Peter Foster and Asa...
description: Until this week, I thought I was following Brexit.
